title: Cut The Crap Playlist - March 2009
description:
(Sorry about the delay, TPB'ers!)


        CUT THE CRAP PLAYLIST - SERIOUSLY UNCRAP - MARCH 2009
      ````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
This month: New PASSION PIT, BELL ORCHESTRE, METRONOMY and FANFARLO.
METRIC goes acoustic, THE FLAMING LIPS cover MADONNA, HOLY FUCK
"re-interprets" RÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬â€œYKSOPP, DUKE DUMONT remixes LILY ALLEN, and CAKE
has really specific tastes in clothing. Plus, two BORN RUFFIAN
tracks, including a WHITE WILLIAMS remix, and 14 more songs you'll
(hopefully) either love immediately or after a few listens.

Enjoy this month's supersized playlist!
___________________________________________________________________

cut the crap playlists: 20 genre- and border-crossing tracks every
month. It doesn't have to be new... it just has to be good.

find out FIRST about new ctc playlists
at the ONLY official ctc website:

mindset - the media tumblelog.
http://mindset.tumblr.com

**people are selling my playlists online. please read:
http://mindset.tumblr.com/post/88638434
___________________________________________________________________
